Soliver Mazo

July 2023

Objective

To create a portfolio for showcasing your my skills. With interactive project displays, skill highlighting, and optimized performance, impress potential employers and clients.

Tools & Technologies

Vue3, Vite, TailwindCSS, GitHub Pages

Share

View project in

Vue 3 + Vite

This template should help get you started developing with Vue 3 in Vite. The template uses Vue 3 <script setup> SFCs, check out the script setup docs to learn more.

Recommended IDE Setup

  • VS Code + Volar (and disable Vetur) + TypeScript Vue Plugin (Volar).
